name: Project four and five (working title)
description:
this a super early test version of Project four and five (working title)

this is a game were you steal bikes and try to avoid the robo cops!

how to steal the bikes:

move: WASD

steal bike: left mouse button

how to punch: left mouse button

when u got max bikes you got the garage(the building on your right when you start)

then press left mouse button

THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS SO YOU CAN HELP ME FIND THOSE BUGS AND IMPROVE THE GAME; THERE IS NO STORY OR GAMEPLAY YET ITS ALL WORKING FEATURES;
